thread.title: These Sun eApp updates will help create a more user-friendly experience
thread.title_full: These Sun eApp updates will help create a more user-friendly experience

title: These Sun eApp updates will help create a more user-friendly experience
text:
Improved application selection
We're making it easier to choose the correct application type right from the start. After clicking "Start an application," you'll see clear options for:
- New business application
- Replacement, conversion or option
- Special quote application
- Supplementary application
Remember: For external replacements (non-Sun Life business), select New business application. For internal Sun Life replacements or conversions, always choose Replacement, conversion or option.
Underwriting evidence collection method
When eligible for Instant Approval (IA) or Straight Through Underwriting (STU), using the default Non-medical option can lead to faster processing times. If you select Tele-interview in these scenarios, you'll now see a warning pop-up to comfirm this is your intended choice.
These updates will help reduce unnecessary delays and improve overall application processing times. For more details about Sun eApp, login to Suncentral.
Questions? Contact the advisor experience team at advisorexperienceteam@sunlife.com.
